title: uNDu kuladheiva raaman
sahitya:
uNDu kuladeivaraaman namakkuNDu
uyir yaavum purakkum aiyan
(uNDu)

anupallavi 

toNDu seydu raama raamavenru
tudippOr kuDi taangum karuNai nidi
(uNDu)

caraNam

paNDu poru koNaappizhai porutti
koNDu sharaNamenru kadaRiya
miNDan kaakaasooranukku aruL
kOdaNDa paaNi enum deenasharaNyan
(uNDu)
